titleStmt.title: The history of the Old Testament methodiz'd according to the order and series of time wherein the several things therein mentioned were transacted ... to which is annex'd a Short history of the Jewish affairs from the end of the Old Testament to the birth of our Saviour : and a map also added of Canaan and the adjacent countries ... / by Samuel Cradock ...
titleStmt.author: Cradock, Samuel, 1621?-1706.

titleStmt.title: The history of the Old Testament methodiz'd according to the order and series of time wherein the several things therein mentioned were transacted ... to which is annex'd a Short history of the Jewish affairs from the end of the Old Testament to the birth of our Saviour : and a map also added of Canaan and the adjacent countries ... / by Samuel Cradock ...
titleStmt.author: Cradock, Samuel, 1621?-1706.

notesStmt.note: "A chronological table of the seven ages of the world from the creation to the death of Jesus Christ" and "A map of Canaan" (both folded) inserted after p. [21], pt. 1; and "The particular kings that reigned successively in those four kingdom" inserted between p. 2-3 of pt. 2.
Advertisement on p. [1]-[2] at end of pt. 2.
Reproduction of original in University of Chicago Library.
